official_title: A bill to amend an Act to add certain lands on the Island of Hawaii to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire additional lands for the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, Hawaii. Authorizes appropriations.
